name: Play it again Sam 5
overview: A compilation of 4 games: Bug Blaster a single player Centipede style shooter. It was written by Steve Evans and was originally released in 1983 by Alligata. Elixir a single player platformer. It was written by Christopher Hyde, John Llewellyn and Richard Williams and was originally released in 1987 by Superior/Blue Ribbon. Fortress a single player adaptation of Zaxxon. It was written by Mat Newman and was originally released in 1983 by Pace. Imogen a single player platform adventure. It was written by Michael St. Aubyn and was originally released in 1986 by Micro Power.
